text: @costareports All the problems facing the country: surging #COVID19 infections and deaths, systemic racism, Russian/Taliban bounties on members of US Military, economic meltdown, unprecedented levels of unemployment, etc., and Trump is searching for a nickname for his opponent. Outrageous.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
